member.name: T:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType
member.summary: Defines the constants that specify how the elements in a DataGrid are sized.

member.name: F:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType.None
member.summary: No sizing. The DefaultLineSize will be set for the columns.

member.name: F:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType.Auto
member.summary: The size is based on the contents of both the cells and the column header.

member.name: F:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType.AutoWithLastColumnFill
member.summary: The size is based on the contents of both the cells and the column header with last column fill by default. The column to be filled can be any column.

member.name: F:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType.AutoLastColumnFill
member.summary: The size is based on the contents of both the cells and the column header with last column autofill. The column to be filled can be any column.

member.name: F:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType.SizeToCells
member.summary: The size is based on the contents of the cells.

member.name: F:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType.SizeToHeader
member.summary: The size is based on the contents of the column header.

member.name: F:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.ColumnSizerType.Star
member.summary: The size is a weighted proportion of available space.

member.name: T:Qhta.WPF.Behaviors.DataGridBehavior
member.summary: Declares an extensive behavior for DataGrid controls.
